review: What I really wanted to do was get easy access to netflix, amazon video and, most importantly, the movies/pictures I have on my network storage drive. Well... I was disappointed because it doesn't access my NAS out of the box. BUT i was able to sideload xmbc to it and now I can play whatever I need from my nas. It's mind blowing (to me anyway) that this thing can decode 720p or 1080p mkv files by itself when sometimes even my laptop struggles. One star docked because I had to put my "hacker" hat on and side load xmbc to the device to get it to do what I need.Oh, the remote is great too!
